title: Betrayal
description: Matthew Caldwell is the only thing keeping me in this city. If I didn't love him, I'd be long gone.I need to prove that I belong here in his life. I'm going to become one of the elite. I'm going to live like an Untouchable. No one will be able to break me. Ever. Again.But my new family is dangerous. And I never realized that meant I was in danger too.
author: Ivy Smoak
